xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 11 April 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 02:56 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 03:59 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:10 <phd> has joined #ccm 04:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:15 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:20 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:27 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:35 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:41 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:51 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 05:04 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 05:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 05:16 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 05:22 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 05:36 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 05:51 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 06:02 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 06:32 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 07:24 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 08:06 <Sathaye> has joined #ccm 08:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 08:30 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 09:45 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 11:10 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 11:47 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 12:48 <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm 12:48 <ravigarg27> I had actually gone through the project idea but will surely work around the functionalities of PhenoTips 13:10 <hs> has joined #ccm 13:47 <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm 13:55 <qwebirc30748> has joined #ccm 13:55 <qwebirc30748> hi 13:56 <qwebirc30748> i would like to contribute to GSoc 2013 13:57 <qwebirc30748> in computational medicine 13:57 <qwebirc30748> i need help 13:58 <sdumitriu> Hi qwebirc30748 13:58 <qwebirc30748> finally someone responded 13:59 <sdumitriu> Sorry, we're all a bit busy at an event 14:01 <qwebirc81245> has joined #ccm 14:01 <qwebirc30748> can you answer my few questions right now... or you are like very busy? 14:03 <sdumitriu> I'll try 14:03 <sdumitriu> Go ahead 14:05 <qwebirc30748> i have some skills on java and GUI development... are there any projects suitable for me? 14:05 <sdumitriu> GUI in Java? 14:05 <sdumitriu> Or GUI in general? 14:05 <sdumitriu> Java is perfect, almost all of the projects involve Java 14:06 <qwebirc30748> GUI in Java 14:07 <sdumitriu> OK, Savant and MedSavant have that 14:07 <sdumitriu> But the idea is to move away from GUIs in Java to rich web clients 14:08 <sdumitriu> Do you have any web development experience, especially on the client side (JS, CSS) 14:08 <qwebirc30748> but i am also intrested in web apps especially in Ruby on Rails... will that be of any use? 14:09 <qwebirc30748> actually i have developed a small app in Ruby on Rails which visualizes data using Google visualization API 14:09 <qwebirc30748> can such knowledge be of any use? 14:09 <sdumitriu> Ruby, no 14:10 <sdumitriu> What's good about RoR is that it uses Prototype.js, which is what we're using in PhenoTips 14:10 <qwebirc30748> so can i be of any use in any of your projects? 14:11 <qwebirc30748> actually this is what i have developed.. you can have a quick look http://track-data.herokuapp.com/ 14:15 <sushilthe> has joined #ccm 14:15 <sushilthe> ok sdumitriu i am the one talking about the RoR 14:15 <sushilthe> sorry for the disruption 14:15 <sushilthe> my coneection lost 14:16 <sushilthe> please can you suggest me something upto my knowledge? 14:16 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 14:16 <sdumitriu> sushilthe: Nice app 14:17 <sushilthe> Thank You 14:17 <sdumitriu> So, you'd like something visual, and which should involve Java 14:17 <sdumitriu> Or the other way around, something in Java, which should also be visual? 14:18 <vshivam> Hi! 14:18 <vshivam> I wanted to work on -- Mobile application for chronic disease management 14:18 <sushilthe> yeah.. that's what i think would fit me 14:18 <vshivam> for Gsoc 13 14:18 <vshivam> can someone please guide me on how to get started ? 14:21 <sdumitriu> sushilthe: What do you think about this? https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Savant+Touch+%28Android+Version+of+Savant%29 14:22 <sdumitriu> vshivam: Hi, the mentor for that project isn't here at the moment, you should send him an email to get more information 14:22 <sushilthe> Do you think it is ok for me? 14:22 <sushilthe> does it fit my knowledge area 14:22 <vshivam> sdumitriu : thanks, will do 14:23 <qwebirc81245> hi 14:24 <qwebirc81245> Hi shivam, where are u from? 14:25 <sdumitriu> sushilthe: It involves a lot of Java and GUI, but it also requires Android development 14:26 <sushilthe> does it means that i must have all the knowledge about Android development? 14:28 <sdumitriu> Well, GSoC is about learning, so it's not strongly required to know any of the technologies 14:28 <sdumitriu> But since the number of slots is limited, we'll prefer to take someone that knows more 14:28 <vshivam> hi qwebirc81245 14:28 <vshivam> India 14:29 <sdumitriu> Since GSoC is for students, it's expected not to get experts, but young minds willing to learn under the guidance of senior developers 14:30 <sushilthe> that's fine... so what do you think i should be doing right now 14:30 <sushilthe> should i be trying to develop some Android apps? 14:30 <sushilthe> show my progress... make you believe that i can do it... or is there something else? 14:35 <sdumitriu> sushilthe: Contact Marc, the mentor for that project, asking for more information 14:37 <sushilthe> i have already done that 14:37 <sdumitriu> K 14:37 <sdumitriu> Try to get the hang of Savant 14:37 <sdumitriu> See if you can get it to build (hint: it only works in NetBeans, we 14:37 <sdumitriu> 're going to improve that) 14:38 <sushilthe> can you show me the source of the savant? 14:38 <sushilthe> a link 14:38 <sdumitriu> Play with it, see what it can do 14:38 <sushilthe> maybe 14:38 <sdumitriu> And try to understand the code a bit 14:38 <sushilthe> ok.... i'll be doing that 14:38 <sdumitriu> http://www.genomesavant.com/p/savant/download 14:38 <sushilthe> will it be any good if i contribute some bug fix or tweak some feature? 14:39 <sdumitriu> The code is currently here: https://svn2.assembla.com/svn/savant/Savant/trunk/ 14:39 <sdumitriu> We're in the process of moving it to GitHub, so if you prefer git, you can look at https://github.com/compbio-UofT/savant 14:39 <sdumitriu> But it's a tiny bit outdated 14:40 <sushilthe> ok thanks for the github link.... i am kind of a github guy 14:41 <sushilthe> can this code be tested in eclipse? 14:41 <sdumitriu> Nope 14:41 <sdumitriu> Not yet 14:41 <sdumitriu> I have to push my changes which make it work in any environment 14:41 <sdumitriu> But I didn't have time to finish that move 14:42 <sushilthe> i think it is in netbeans... i don't know if android can be setup in netbeans... 14:42 <sushilthe> ok 14:42 <sdumitriu> It should happen soon 14:47 <sushilthe> will it be fine.. if i use github? 15:00 <qwebirc81245> has left #ccm 15:09 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 15:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:19 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 15:34 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 15:35 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:49 <vshivam_> has joined #ccm 15:49 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 16:06 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 16:10 <ravigarg27> sdumitriu, I tried working around Phenotips and have understood many of its functions. I was also exploring on how to implement the project and got stuck at one place about the description of the input data. Can you please brief me what the input will be like? 16:12 <sdumitriu> That's about https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Extraction+of+ontology+terms+from+free+form+clinical+notes right? 16:12 <ravigarg27> yup 16:12 <ravigarg27> Specifically, Will the input be like full description text or just only the phenotype terms 16:13 <sdumitriu> Well, hard to say 16:13 <sdumitriu> Depends on the doctor 16:13 <sdumitriu> Getting something useful out of both kinds of data would be perfect 16:14 <ravigarg27> hehe ok yeah so will have to include the preprocessing the algorithm 16:44 <ravigarg27_> has joined #ccm 16:44 <ravigarg27_> has left #ccm 16:45 <ravigarg27_> has joined #ccm 18:31 <vshivam_> has joined #ccm 19:09 <vshivam_> has joined #ccm 20:45 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 20:58 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 21:09 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 23:40 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm
